outcome: Council appoints Dr. Irina Shevtsova, a Harmonist, as interim head, restoring partial access and calming public uncertainty.

events.description: Dr. Irina Shevtsova, a respected Harmonist, is quietly installed as interim head; a brief address promises stability.
Travel access issues cause minor disruptions in commuter hubs, but Shevtsova prioritizes restoring housing and employment systems.
Shevtsova secretly meets with Council Innovators, counseling for restraint and promising a future review of BCI flagging policies.
A subtle BCI update slightly raises compliance scores, calming tensions and restoring public trust in automated systems.
